text: Richard Biefnot (24 March 1949 â€“ 18 August 2020) was a Belgian politician. He was on the Parliament of Wallonia from 1999 to 2004. He was also a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 1995 to 1999 and a member of the Socialist Party. Biefnot died on 18 August 2020, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian mayors Category:Socialist Party (Belgium) politicians Category:People from Hainaut (province) Category:Walloon politicians
